name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: WA聊单宝-非官方的效率工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 更懂营销的WhatsApp插件，集成群发系统，数据导出，客户备注，无限置顶，上下线订阅，隐私设置等功能的综合性应用插件！
short.en: A more marketing-oriented WhatsApp plugin that integrates features like bulk messaging, data export, customer notes, unlimited…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
WA聊单宝插件集成了很多WhatsApp工具，更方便的客户管理和消息群发。

功能&特点：
1，超强的群发功能集成，养号模式，群组群发，好友群发，群发分组，多附件排序，模板切换，数据看板等；
2，数据中心表格展示，数据筛选，导出Excel和Vcf文件，复制手机号进行消息群发；
3，订阅功能，用户上下线的时候可以进行上下线提示；
4，标签栏设置，用户聊天页面单独设置用户标签，通过标签，未读，待回复，需要回复等状态筛选用户；
5，用户设置，设置用户昵称和备注，以及无限置顶等；
6，一键开启陌生人聊天，全屏显示，聊天列表快捷键滚动等；
7，绑定Shopibar店铺，聊天页面可以直接给客户创建支付链接，显示客户历史订单，物流追踪等；
8，手机号文件导入至聊天列表或者标签组，先筛活跃账号再导入；
9，隐私设置，隐身设置，隐藏输入中...

声明：
WhatsApp是WhatsApp Inc.在美国和其他国家注册的商标。WhatsApp™应用管理是一个独立项目，与WhatsApp官方或WhatsApp Inc.没有任何关系。
long.en:
WA Chat Treasure Plugin integrates numerous WhatsApp tools, making customer management and bulk messaging more convenient.

Features & Highlights:
1, Powerful Bulk Messaging: Includes account warming mode, group messaging, friend messaging, group segmentation, multiple attachments sorting, template switching, and data dashboards.
2, Data Center: Displays data in table format, supports data filtering, exports to Excel and VCF files, and allows copying phone numbers for bulk messaging.
3, Subscription Feature: Get notified when users come online or go offline.
4, Tag Settings: Customize user tags on the chat page, filter users by tags, unread status, pending replies, required responses, etc.
5, User Settings: Set user nicknames, notes, and enable unlimited pinning of chats.
6, One-Click Stranger Chat: Start chats with unknown contacts with one click, enjoy full-screen display, and quick scrolling with chat list shortcuts.
7, Shopibar Store Integration: Create payment links directly from the chat page, view customer order history, and track logistics.
8, Phone Number File Import: Import phone numbers to chat lists or tag groups after filtering for active accounts.
9, Privacy Settings: Invisible mode, hide "typing..." status, and more.

Disclaimer:
WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp Inc. in the United States and other countries. This WhatsApp™ management plugin is an independent project and has no official affiliation with WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
